snippet.title: PlayLink | Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Snap, draw, tilt and sing your way to victory! PayLink is a new way to play with your mobile phone and PS4.

Hidden Agenda, SingStar Celebration and Knowledge is Power launch today, while That's You! is out now. 

Find out more about the PlayLink series: https://www.playstation.com//explore/ps4/games/playlink/
